contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Not all of the available modules will be used for our clients. Especially the media library since its no longer recommended. How do we hide unused items from the Xperience by Kentico dashboard? **Is there a way to do this without having to set permission**s?
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.3.1]
* .NET version: \[8]
* Execution environment: \[SaaS|Private cloud (Azure/AWS/Virtual machine)]
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
